channel.title: Screw you school, we're going to protest
channel.description:
http://rs2gods.net/haha.html
Yes, we have too many hours on school, usually 9-10 sometimes 11. So every school in my city, Groningen decided to protest, but it went a little bit far and became riots with the police. But still, the police can't handle us anymore. We make a small fire, cops and shit come and screw our fire :( Then we make another, etc. By the way, that big house at some of the vids is the City hall.
Edit: Also the teachers on our school are going to protest because they also think there are too many hours, they want more money or they leave.

item.title: Screw you school, we're going to protest

Lol, pretty funny!

item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:29, topic:158679”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=216225.msg1884691#msg1884691 date=1195330144]

Just quit the school if you can’t handle it?
[/quote]Your stupid.

Oh, the irony.[/quote]
Haha.

Read full topic
item.source: Screw you school, we're going to protest

item.title: Screw you school, we're going to protest
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“climbing to the top, post:23, topic:158679”]Wow this is the most interesting thread i have seen for months on this forum.

8 hours a day is too much for me, i want less hours!!!
Protesting against the school with so many people would be a dream come true.[/quote]
I used to attend a public school which had 6 hours a day. The day seemed too long and I had 1 hour lessons and 1 20 minutes break, and 1 40 minute break.
I now go to a private school which is 8 hours and 20 minutes.
We have 9 lessons in one day, each 40 minutes long and 3 40 minute breaks.
I don’t understand but the 8 hour school seems so much less then the 6 hours a day.

my 2 cents.

Read full topic

You have passed such a test.

item.title: Screw you school, we're going to protest
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Strange thing is, I live in the Netherlands aswell and I only have upto 8 hours a day, and a max of ~25 a week.

Holy crap, you’re lucky as fuck !

r4ndom1:

your doing it wrong. When theres that many of you you should burn down buildings not pieces of paper. Reminds me of primary school…

Our plan was just without fires until some riot makers came and started making them, burning down buildings would go a little bit far, and the fire department follows us always lol.

[quote=“climbing to the top, post:23, topic:158679”]Wow this is the most interesting thread i have seen for months on this forum.

8 hours a day is too much for me, i want less hours!!!
Protesting against the school with so many people would be a dream come true.[/quote]Also lucky

Let’s see who wins…

We will, over 50% pupils doesn’t go to school anymore and we have the minister of education here in my city who also agrees with us, now just have to go to the minister who made those hours for us and he’ll get it down maybe.[/quote]
Go ikiliki!!!

Hope the riot police comes again monday.
We’re planning on making the biggest protest in history in this city.
[/quote]

By “we’re”, do you mean “a few people, but me and most others will just watch and agree”?

G/L. 9 hours of school must be a bitch and a half.[/quote]
Honestly. No duh. You people vs the goverment.
Let’s see who wins…

item.title: Screw you school, we're going to protest
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Chris,
With the “we’re” I’m talking about upto 500-700 people probably, don’t know exactly, but I’m sure it’s around that.
The school who started it already had like 300 people, my school with it also alot, and around 4/5 other schools.
Don’t know if they get other schools also, but those schools suck more then mine.
Edit: Nope, I’m not just sitting there and watching it kekek, trying to put a vid on which I made with my mobile, however strange file format googling atm.

[quote=“spankjava, post:16, topic:158679”]dam 9 hours only 6 hours for me and how long did the riots last[/quote]12:00 till 17:00 they said, I was there till 16:00, I was tired of the police touching me like pedo’s.

Read full topic
